body_html:
@jvdillon @sb2nov

Sorry for my delay to handle the test failure. I think this test failure occurred because there were not enough sample time when check the covariance from sampling, which led to some deviation. And I fix it by augmenting the sample time.

As for improving in the underlying multinomial sampler, thanks for jvdillon's support first, but I am not sure if I have enough time to achieve that. If I have enough time in the future, I will create a new PR for modify the underlying sampler.
